snippet: The Obama administration is grappling with a surge in child migrants at the southwestern U.S. border, some accompanied by parents and some traveling alone....

headline.print_headline: Factbox: Obama Administration Struggles With Child Migrant Crisis
headline.main: Factbox: Obama Administration Struggles With Child Migrant Crisis

lead_paragraph: The Obama administration is grappling with a surge in child migrants at the southwestern U.S. border, some accompanied by parents and some traveling alone.
